jd: From: suganesh, Infinity quest suganesh.s@i-q.co Reply to: suganesh.s@i-q.co Azure ML ArchitectSanta Clara, CA55/hr. on C2C UST/Applied Materials Must Have SkillsSkill 1 – Strong programming skills in PythonSkill 2 – Hands-on experience on design, and optimizing LLM, natural language processing (NLP) systems, frameworks, and toolsSkill 3 – Building RAG application independently using available open source LLM models. data bricks and Azure ML architect for their client. Successful candidate will have hands-on experience on design, and optimizing LLM, natural language processing (NLP) systems, frameworks, and tools. Skills and Responsibilities • Experience in designing and implementing scalable and secure Azure cloud solutions using Data Bricks ML platform. • Model development , deployment and job scheduling using unstructured data. • Certification in databricks ML • Expert level in Designing and Architect solutions in Azure Data factory, Azure Databricks, Azure Datalake, Delta Lake and Azure synapse analytics implementation. • Experience in Azure cloud technologies like PySpark, Synapse, ADF, Databricks, Python, Scala and SQL. • Have good experience configuring Microservices using Docker, Kubernetes on Azure Data Bricks • Extensive Experience on working on Azure AI services including Data Bricks and Azure cognitive services • Highly preferred experience on working with Azure OpenAI services • Hands-on experience on design, and optimizing LLM, natural language processing (NLP) systems, frameworks, and tools
